ygData.subject: Re: Running Through Beholder
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Huh.  I make the run through the maze all the time, using Accelerando, rarely see any eyes at all.  I just run along the gorge floor, hugging the left wall
ygData.messageBody:
> >Is it possible to run through Beholder with Accelerando? I made the trip
> >through last weekend crawling along high on the cliff and it was nerve
> >wracking. I would much rather make a fast dash through and get it over
> >with! But I saw at least a dozen evil eyes from my vantage point on the
> >cliff wall...can I run past fast enough to avoid trouble?

Huh. I make the run through the maze all the time, using Accelerando,
rarely see any eyes at all. I just run along the gorge floor, hugging the
left wall (from runnyeye, that is). Used to get poked by the occasional
muddite, rarely happens to me anymore, waaaaay to fast for 'em <grin> Of
course, if I do see an eye, I turn tail and run back and wait.

Very important to give a shout if you start pulling a train, though, to warn
the folks who will have to deal with it at the zone borders, seem to be lots
of folk hunting thereabouts these days.

--
Jamon, student of The Soerbaird | http://www.soerbaird.com
Plane of Solusek Ro | jamon@...
